rooms.description: A welcoming entrance hall with minimalistic design and ambient lighting.
Spacious living area integrated with the central courtyard for natural light and ventilation. Features modern decor to suit luxury aesthetics.
Contemporary kitchen equipped with state-of-the-art amenities, with an open design to connect with the dining area.
Modern dining space adjacent to the living room and kitchen for easy entertaining.
Cozy guest bedroom with modern furnishing, designed to provide comfort and privacy.
Functional bathroom placed conveniently near the guest room and living area.

openings.description: Double glass doors with secure access, aligning with Vastu principles for positive energy flow.
Large archway leading into the central courtyard, facilitating natural light and ventilation while ensuring privacy.
Contemporary windows with smart glazing for energy efficiency and optimal natural illumination.
Balconies providing access to the large central garden, promoting relaxation and integration with nature.

additional_features.description: An open courtyard that serves as a light well and recreational area in keeping with Vastu design principles, enhancing the overall ambience.
Luxurious garden with native landscaping, ensuring sustainability and aesthetic appeal. Designed for relaxation and outdoor gatherings.
